description:
Give your bike an at-home spa session. The 4-piece brush set is designed to clean every nook and cranny, and the ergonomic handles use comfortable dual density rubber.

  • GSC-1 gear clean brush
  • Tapered detail brush
  • Frame cleaning sponge/bristle brush
  • Soft bristle soaping brush
name: Park Tool BCB-4.2 Bike Cleaning Brush Set
